name: Rise of the Pizzombies
description:
Controls:

Move - W,A,S,D

Interact - E

Inventory - Esc

In Rise of the Pizzombies, Chef Vinny has been trapped in his restaurant with pizza crusts possessed by an unknown force. He must eliminate the paranormal threat and save his restaurant by shooting down, hitting around, and blowing up pizzas with ingredient based weapons scattered around the restaurant, and solving the mystery behind the evil force trying to ruin his five star reputation.

Rise of the Pizzombies is a top-down shooter perspective action game.

Inspired by a class project, and previously published title on GameJolt, The Pizzas Have Guns
